name: Water Mage [demo]
description:
A fantasy visual novel about an untalented magician, Savay, who is next in line to become guardian of her village. When faced with pressure, she struggles to make the right choices.

Demo Features:

  • cast consisting of:
    • female protagonist
    • short big sis
    • cat girl without cat ears
    • emo childhood friend
    • 2 dads
  • my blood sweat and tears
  • 10 - 15 minutes long

Demo does not feature:

  • mysterious dark-haired man
    • available in the full game

expected full game release ~late 2021
